binding.name: wt
binding.literal: Mock-Up mp3 To Wav Migrate And QA

binding.name: wdesc
binding.literal: This is a Mock-Up Workflow illustrating SCAPE solution 'SO4 mp3 To Wav Migrate And QA Mock Up', see wiki.opf-labs.org/display/SP/SO4+Audio+mp3+to+wav+Migration+and+QA+Workflow

binding.name: wt
binding.literal: MP3 to WAV Migrate Validate Compare

binding.name: wdesc
binding.literal:
This workflow migrates an mp3 file to wav using a SCAPE ffmpeg web service. It validates the migrated file using a jhove2 SCAPE web service. It extracts and compares simple characteristic using an ffprobe SCAPE web service. This workflow matches (most of) solution SO4 on the SCAPE opf wiki, see http://wiki.opf-labs.org/display/SP/SO4+Audio+mp3+to+wav+Migration+and+QA+Workflow

It is a combination of the following workflows

  • FFmpeg mp3 to Wav Migration SCAPE Web Service Workflow http://www.myexperiment.org/workflows/2713.html
  • Validate Wav File Format using JHOVE2 SCAPE Web Service Workflow http://www.myexperiment.org/workflows/2637.html
  • Compare Audio File Properties Workflow http://www.myexperiment.org/workflows/2715.html

The SCAPE web services are available from http://fue.onb.ac.at:80/lscapeservices/ for the SCAPE community (password protected).

binding.name: wt
binding.literal: FFmpeg mp3 to Wav Migration SCAPE Web Service Workflow

binding.name: wdesc
binding.literal:
Given an mp3 input file, the workflow uses the FFmpeg SCAPE Web Service to migrate the file to WAV. Part of SCAPE solution SO4, see wiki.opf-labs.org/display/SP/SO4+Audio+mp3+to+wav+Migration+and+QA+Workflow

The SCAPE web service is available from http://fue.onb.ac.at:80/lscapeservices/scape-ffmpeg25305-service/ for the SCAPE community (password protected).

binding.name: wt
binding.literal: mp3 to Wav Migrate, Extract Properties and Compare Workflow

binding.name: wdesc
binding.literal:
Given an mp3 input file, the workflow uses the FFmpeg SCAPE Web Service to migrate the file to WAV. Next extracts properties from the original and the migrated file using the FFProbe SCAPE web service, which returns a property text file. Next compares the properties expected to be consistent after migration. Part of SCAPE solution SO4, see http://wiki.opf-labs.org/display/SP/SO4+Audio+mp3+to+wav+Migration+and+QA+Workflow

This workflow is a combination of the two workflows

  • FFmpeg mp3 to Wav Migration SCAPE Web Service Workflow  www.myexperiment.org/workflows/2713 and
  • Compare Audio File Properties Workflow www.myexperiment.org/workflows/2715

binding.name: wdesc
binding.literal:
This workflow migrates an mp3 file to wav using a SCAPE ffmpeg web service. It performs QA in the following steps

  • validates the migrated file using a jhove2 SCAPE web service
  • extracts and compares simple characteristic using an ffprobe SCAPE web service
  • compares the waveforms of the original and migrated file using a migrationQA SCAPE web service

This workflow matches solution SO4 on the SCAPE opf wiki, see http://wiki.opf-labs.org/display/SP/SO4+Audio+mp3+to+wav+Migration+and+QA+Workflow
 

This workflow combines workflows

  • FFmpeg mp3 to Wav Migration SCAPE Web Service Workflow http://www.myexperiment.org/workflows/2713
  • Validate Wav File Format using JHOVE2 SCAPE Web Service Workflow http://www.myexperiment.org/workflows/2637
  • Compare Audio File Properties Workflow http://www.myexperiment.org/workflows/2715
  • migrationQA SCAPE Web Service including MPG321 decoding Workflow http://www.myexperiment.org/workflows/2806

The workflow uses SCAPE web services available from http://fue.onb.ac.at:80/lscapeservices/ for the SCAPE community (password protected).

binding.name: wt
binding.literal: Migrate Mp3 to Wav Validate Compare List to List

binding.name: wdesc
binding.literal:
This workflow migrates a list of mp3 files to wav files using the MP3 to WAV Migrate Validate Compare workflow. See description here. The workflow uses SCAPE web services, which are set up locally. The webservices are set up using the github.com/openplanets/scape project tool descriptors. The used SCAPE web services are the ffmpeg, jhove2 and ffprobe web services. This workflow matches (most of) solution SO4 on the SCAPE opf wiki, see http://wiki.opf-labs.org/display/SP/SO4+Audio+mp3+to+wav+Migration+and+QA+Workflow.

The workflow input value is a fileURL containing a list of input MP3 URLs. The output is a list of Wav fileURLs, a list of validation outputs (valid / not valid ) and a list of comparison outputs (properties alike / not alike).

binding.name: wdesc
binding.literal: A simple executable plan containing a migration action component and a QA component. The migration action uses imagemagick convert. The QA component consists of two characterisation components (fits) and another QA components (imagemagick compare).

binding.name: wdesc
binding.literal: Converts an image using imagemagick convert
